about_the_game:
A first-person, realistic horror game that places you in the role of a newly hired security guard at a Malaysian school with a sinister reputation. As night falls, your patrols quickly take a terrifying turn when you encounter restless spirits and supernatural phenomena drawn from the depths of Malaysian folklore. The eerie silence of the school’s corridors and the unsettling shadows lurking in corners hint at a history that refuses to stay buried.

With every step, you’ll navigate detailed, immersive environments—from creaky, dimly lit classrooms to abandoned courtyards and forgotten shrines. Uncover clues, interact with tormented spirits, and piece together the tragic events that have bound these entities to the school grounds. Your choices determine how you confront the supernatural: will you use traditional exorcism rituals to bring peace, or will your decisions deepen the horrors you face?

Experience a rich narrative-driven adventure where every decision matters. The deeper you delve into the school's mysteries, the more you discover the hidden truths behind each haunting. Will you survive the night and uncover the real story behind the school's old caretaker, or will you become another lost soul in its haunted halls?

Features:

First-Person Realism: Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted school environment, with realistic graphics and atmospheric sound design that pull you into the heart of the horror.

Supernatural Encounters: Face spirits and creatures inspired by Malaysian folklore, each with unique backstories tied to the school’s dark past.

Choice-Driven Narrative: Your decisions impact the story, influencing how you interact with spirits, solve mysteries, and determine the fate of the haunted school.

Exploration-Based Gameplay: Wander through realistic, shadowy hallways and forgotten rooms, piecing together the history behind the eerie occurrences.

Exorcism Mechanics: Utilize traditional Malaysian rituals to confront the supernatural and bring peace to restless souls.

Multiple Endings: Explore different paths and outcomes based on the choices you make, adding depth and replayability to the chilling story.

Venture into Souls That Wait: Penunggu, where the line between reality and the supernatural blurs, and the truth hides in the shadows. Will you uncover the secrets behind the hauntings, or will the darkness consume you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
